Text:
Great work! Sounds really nice.

I'm going to become a father of twins soon so I want my kids to enjoy some hi-fi Bob Marley when they're born.

Never heard a better compilation of Bob Marley's music. 

Your choices are as good as I would have made. 

Thank you!

isakth,  CONGRATULATIONS!!!!  I have two boys, ages 4 & 3.  We play alot of music and Mr. Marley is always in heavy rotation.... I've got some earlier stuff that I'll post in a few days.  He was an amazing Man.

bushwhacker, thank you.  The "Songs Of Freedom" box set is good too.
Thanks for this!!! It's wonderful :). Sounds great!
